title: There are several trees leaning heavily over the east side of Edgewater Club Road that look perilously close to falling across the road.  Is the county responsible for removing this hazard before someone is killed or is it the responsibility of the people who own the property.  The trees are very close to the ditch and in a very wet location.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/06/who-is-responsible-for-trees-leaning-perilously-over-a-road-the-property-owner-or-the-county/
